member.name: Windows.MFCreateSinkWriterFromMediaSink
member.summary: Creates the sink writer from a media sink.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of a media sink.
Pointer to the interface. You can use this parameter to configure the sink writer. For more information, see Sink Writer Attributes. This parameter can be NULL.
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.MFCreateSinkWriterFromURL
member.summary: Creates the sink writer from a URL or byte stream.
member.param: A null-terminated string that contains the URL of the output file. This parameter can be NULL.

param.name: pByteStream
param.para: Pointer to the interface of a byte stream. This parameter can be NULL.

If this parameter is a valid pointer, the sink writer writes to the provided byte stream. (The byte stream must be writable.) Otherwise, if pByteStream is NULL, the sink writer creates a new file named pwszOutputURL.

member.param: Pointer to the interface. You can use this parameter to configure the sink writer. For more information, see Sink Writer Attributes. This parameter can be NULL.
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: This function can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The specified URL was not found.

member.name: Windows.MFCreateSourceReaderFromByteStream
member.summary: Creates the source reader from a byte stream.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of a byte stream. This byte stream will provide the source data for the source reader.
Pointer to the interface. You can use this parameter to configure the source reader. For more information, see Source Reader Attributes. This parameter can be NULL.
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.MFCreateSourceReaderFromURL
member.summary: Creates the source reader from a URL.
member.param: The URL of a media file to open.
Pointer to the interface. You can use this parameter to configure the source reader. For more information, see Source Reader Attributes. This parameter can be NULL.
Receives a pointer to the interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
